SustainabilityUom.name: SustainabilityUom
SustainabilityUom.description: Represents information about the additional unit of measure values defined by a customer.

Description.description: The description of the unit of measure.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the record. For custom units of measure in the FuelTypeSustnUom, StnryAssetEnrgyUse and VehicleAssetEnrgyUse objects, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value in combination with {NamespacePrefix}_custom_ is used; for example, ftPackage_custom_bundle, else, this value in combination with custom_ is used; for example, custom_bundle.

IsProductUom.description: Indicates whether the unit of measure is for a product that the company has procured in its supply chain operations (true) or not (false).

IsStationaryAssetUom.description: Indicates whether the unit of measure is used in the stationary asset calculations (true) or (not).

IsVehicleAssetUom.description: Indicates whether the unit of measure is used in vehicle asset calculations (true) or (not).

IsWasteUom.description: Indicates whether the unit of measure is used in the waste calculations (true) or (not).

Language.description: The language associated with this object.

MasterLabel.description: The label assigned to this object.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Limit: 15 characters.

UnitType.description: The type of unit used for conversions or calculations.
